price: តើពួកគេ(ពួកជំនាន់មុន)បានផ្ដាំផ្ញើគ្នាអំពីពាក្យសំដីនេះ ឬ? ផ្ទុយទៅវិញ ពួកគេគឺជាក្រុមដែលបំពាន។
arabic: أَتَوَاصَوۡاْ بِهِۦۚ بَلۡ هُمۡ قَوۡمٞ طَاغُونَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: atawāṣaw bihi bal hum qawmun ṭāghūna
translations: Have they transmitted it to them
Have they transmitted it to them
